sentences.sContent: A blackbird flew down and perched on the parapet outside his window.
sentences.sCn: 一只乌鸫飞下来，栖息在他家窗外的矮墙上。

synos.tran: 栖息；就位；位于；使坐落于

remMethod.val: 注意不要和parch(v. 烘， 烤)相混

words.tran: 栖于树上的鸟；高坐者；织物检查工

trans.tranOther: When a bird perches on something such as a branch or a wall, it lands on it and stands there
